    public class MC6809
extends USimMotorola
    Implementation of the Motorola 6809 MPU.

      • signalReset

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Reset the simulator. Program counter is set to the content for the top two bytes in memory. Direct page register is set to 0.
        Overrides:
        reset in class USimMotorola
